eu_initiatives: These are the main initiatives followed by our organization: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
organisation_name: Atomium-European Institute for Science, Media and Democracy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Next Generation Internet Summit 
AI4People Summit  
REIsearch
legal_status: Belgian Association Internationale Sans But Lucratif
goals__remit: Atomium-EISMD convenes leading European universities, media, businesses, governments and policymakers to increase the exchange of information and interdisciplinary collaboration, to develop innovative collaborative initiatives and to encourage frontier thinking about science, media and democracy. Atomium-EISMD was launched publicly by the former President of France Valery Giscard d'Estaing, Michelangelo Baracchi Bonvicini and by the leaders of the institutions engaged during the first conference on the 27 November 2009 at the European Parliament in Brussels.
